text.autoconfig.cleanertooltips.title: Cleaner Tooltips Config
text.autoconfig.cleanertooltips.option.e: Whether the icon attributes should be enabled.
text.autoconfig.cleanertooltips.option.s: Should sharpness change the damage value? this fixes MC-271840.
text.autoconfig.cleanertooltips.option.h: Whether hidden attributes should be hinted at.
text.autoconfig.cleanertooltips.option.d: Should the durability of items be displayed in the tooltip?
Choose the position of the durability.

Note: if icon attributes are disabled, then both INLINE
and BELOW will be displayed below the item name.
text.autoconfig.cleanertooltips.option.s: Should the maximum durability be displayed?
text.autoconfig.cleanertooltips.option.d: Should the color change depending on the remaining durability?
